src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Hello , I 'd like to know where my doctor 's office is ? I have an appointment with her at 3 PM . # greet ( ) ; request ( doctor ( room ) ) [MASK] RC : Do you have an appointment at 3 PM ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( doctor ( room ) ) [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . # acknowledge ( ) ; give-feedback ( positive ) [MASK] RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) [MASK] RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? # r-repet ( ) ARI : Do you need information ? # offer-help ( ) [end] RC : Well , we 'd just like to know where we can get a hot chocolate . # request ( beverage ( hot_chocolate ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( hot ( chocolate ) ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . # inform ( food ) ; inform ( drink ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , that 's good , we 'll go there . We have time before the appointment . # acknowledge ( )
tgt: LP : Hello , I 'd like to know where my doctor 's office is ? I have an appointment with her at 3 PM . # greet ( ) ; request ( doctor ( room ) ) @ G ( LP , get-info ( doctor ( room ) ) RC : Do you have an appointment at 3 PM ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( doctor ( room ) ) @ AG ( LP , go-to ( doctor ( room ) ) RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . # acknowledge ( ) ; give-feedback ( positive ) @ CG ( LP , go-to ( doctor ( room ) ) RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? # r-repet ( ) ARI : Do you need information ? # offer-help ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? # suggest ( eating ) [MASK] LP : I think ... # incomplete-da ( ) LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? # request ( help ) ; request ( directions ( toilet ) ) [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # affirm ( ) ; inform ( location ( cafe ) ) [MASK] RC : And how do we get there ? # request ( directions ( cafe ) ) [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) RC : Before we go to the cafeteria , I 'd like to go to the toilet . Where are the toilets ? # request ( location ( toilet ) ) [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) [MASK] RC : So what do we do , shall we go ? # suggest ( going-to ( toilet ) ) [MASK] [end] LP : I really need to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I did n't understand your request , could you rephrase it ? # r-paraph ( request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : How can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) RC : We would like to go to the toilets . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( toilet ) ) LP : Could you please come with me to the toilets ? # request ( guide-to ( toilet ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LP : I would like to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) )

src: LP : Well it 's my first time here , I do n't know if this is the case for you . I 'd really like to um ... to be able , to be able to eat a little bit before going to my appointment , do you know where that is ? # request ( food ) @ G ( LP , eat ( ) ) RC : You have a good idea ... LP : So um , is it ... # incomplete-da ( ) RC : But I do n't know where we eat , so what do I do ? What do I do ? # request ( help ) LP : So , can we eat ? Is there a designated area for visitors ? # request ( food ) @ G ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) RC : Before lunch , I 'd like to have breakfast . So where can we go ? # request ( food ( breakfast ) ) @ G ( RC , eat ( breakfast ) ) LP : Well , no idea . RC : We 'll ask the question . LP : I have no idea where . First of all , if it 's open to outsiders . RC : I do n't know . LP : So um ... # incomplete-da ( ) RC : We 'll ask him . RC : I do n't know what your name is . Can you give us information and tell us what your name is ? # request ( ari ( name ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , get-info ( ari ( name ) ) ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , get-info ( ari ( name ) ) ) RC : Where 's the cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : How can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RC : On the ground floor . LP : And how do we get to the cafeteria ? # request ( directions ( cafe ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) LP : The second building , um ... Do we take do we take the walkway ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) RC : I 'd really like to know what we can eat . I want a croissant and a large white coffee . # request ( food ( croissant ) ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ; G ( RC , eat ( croissant ) ) ; G ( RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Today we have an endive salad to start , followed by a ham and cheese escalope with a side of mashed potato and a fruit compote for dessert . # inform ( food ( menu ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ; AG ( RC , eat ( croissant ) ) ; AG ( RC , drink ( coffee ) ) [start] LP : Yes , that 's for lunch . We would like a snack , would n't we ? Grab a coffee or breakfast , since we 're early for our appointment . # request ( food ( snack ) ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) ; request ( food ( breakfast ) ) [MASK] ARI : Of course . # affirm ( ) RC : And I 'd really like to go to the toilet too . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) [MASK] RC : Can you tell us where the toilets are ? # request ( location ( toilet ) ) [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) [MASK] RC : Second door on the right . Oh well , we 'll find it . LP : Next to so it 's next to the cafeteria ? # r-confirm ( location ( toilet ) ) [MASK] ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) [MASK] RC : I feel like it 's further away . That , that 's not on the ground floor . LP : I 'm having difficulty understanding what he 's saying . I ca n't hear very well . # cant-hear ( ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . # p-repet ( directions ( toilet ) ) [MASK] LP : In the corridor at the end of the room , on which side ? # request ( location ( toilet ) ) [MASK] RC : We 'll let it go . LP : We 'll leave it , we 'll leave it . RC : We 're going to eat something already . I 'm very hungry . # request ( food ) [MASK] RC : Do you think it 's still time ? Until what time is breakfast served ? # request ( food ( breakfast ) ) [MASK] ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) [MASK] [end] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( ) LP : Um so , if I 've understood correctly , the toilets are next to the cafeteria . # r-confirm ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) LP : I 'm having a hard time hearing actually . # cant-hear ( ) RC : Could you speak a little louder ? # change-volume ( turn_up ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : You ca n't help us , so what are we going to do ? We 'll see something else maybe . # request ( help ) LP : So um ... # incomplete-da ( ) LP : So maybe we 'll go and have a look . Ah yes but well I think I 've forgotten my sheet . LP : I know I have an appointment but I do n't know what time it 's at . How can I find out my appointment time ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Well , firstly do you know where to find um which doctor it is , which department , which specialty . LP : Is there a reception ? # request ( location ( reception ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . # inform ( appt ( general_info ) ) LP : Um , how do I know what time my appointment is ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( ) LP : Um ... And ... And where is um ... Um , I , I remember , I think it 's room 17 . But I 'm not sure . Where is room 17 ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift and it 's on the second floor . # inform ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ AG ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LP : And you arrive directly in room 17 ? # r-confirm ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : Of course . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RC : Maybe it 's at the reception . Maybe there 's a service , a receptionist who will let you know who will tell you . # request ( location ( reception ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( reception ) ) LP : So my appointment time will be confirmed in room 17 ? # request ( appt ( place ) ) @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( place ) ) ) ARI : Thank you . See you around . Have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : Do you want to go to the toilet ? # suggest ( going-to ( toilet ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) ) RP : Oh yes . And it 's urgent . # affirm ( ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( toilet ) ) RP : Is it for women ? # request ( toilet ( for_women ) ) @ G ( RP , go-to ( toilet ( for_women ) ) ) ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RP , go-to ( toilet ( for_women ) ) ) RP : Thanks . # thank ( ) @ CG ( RP , go-to ( toilet ( for_women ) ) ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) RP : Oh , well , I 'd love to . # affirm ( ) @ G ( LC+RP , eat ( ) ) RP : What 's good on your menu ? # request ( food ( menu ) ) @ G ( RP , eat ( ) ) ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . # inform ( food ) @ AG ( LC+RP , eat ( ) ) RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? # request ( food ) @ G ( LC+RP , eat ( ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Well , thanks anyway . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you very much . # thank ( ) LC : Can you tell me where room 17 is ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : Oh , but I do n't know . [start] RP : Is room 17 on the ground floor ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Where is room 17 ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) [MASK] LC : Normally , I have an appointment . RP : I have an appointment in room 17 . # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : So , where do the appointments take place ? Where are the appointments ? # request ( appt ( place ) ) [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Do you have another number for me ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Okay well , thank you then . # acknowledge ( ) ; thank ( ) LC : The appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . # inform ( appt ( time ) ) RP : My appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . # inform ( appt ( time ) ) ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : An appointment of ... gerontology . ARI : Of course . # affirm ( ) RP : Where should I ... Where should I go in the hospital ? # request ( help ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Ca n't you tell me what floor ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Can we not have ... # incomplete-da ( ) RP : Do I ask at the reception ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Well , thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : Thanks . # thank ( ) RP : Can I have a coffee while I wait ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . # inform ( beverage ( coffee ) ) [MASK] RP : And I can have everything I want at this cafeteria ? ARI : Yes . Of course . # affirm ( ) [end] RP : Oh , that 's nice . # give-feedback ( positive ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . # bye ( )
